episodes.name: 01   The Hog Cast Premiere
episodes.description: This is your podcast for information on all of the major Arkansas Razorbacks sports. We will be talking in depth about the NCAA baseball tournament as well as the football and basketball off season.
episodes.keywords: sports,sec,arkansas,razorbacks,west,baseball,woo,pig,sooie,wpss
episodes.imageLink: This is your podcast for information on all of the major Arkansas Razorbacks sports. We will be talking in depth about the NCAA baseball tournament as well as the football and basketball off season.

episodes.name: 02 Hogs Feed the Beaver
episodes.description: Arkansas fights hard and escapes Baylor to punch their ticket to Omaha.
episodes.keywords: arkansas,baseball,omaha,collegeworldseries.,woopigsooie,wps

episodes.name: 03 Omahogs start 2-0
episodes.description: The Razorbacks have put up a stunning effort, starting the CWS with 2 wins and breaking the South Carolina 2 year win streak in the postseason.
episodes.keywords: arkansas,baseball,basketball,bcs,omaha,omahogs,football,sec

episodes.name: 04 Rutgers, Texas A&M, Florida Preview
episodes.description: The hogs look to bounce back against Florida after losing a heart breaker to Rutgers and looking strong in a losing effort to Johnny Football.
episodes.keywords: arkansas,eastern,conference,college,ncaaf,razorbacks,woo,pig,sooie,wps,audio,football,sec,south

episodes.name: 05 South Carolina Game
episodes.description: We recap the Florida game and prepare for the South Carolina game. As well as have a little fun with Coach Spurriers coaches show.
episodes.keywords: arkansas,audio football sec south,eastern,conference,college,ncaaf,razorbacks,woo,pig,sooie,wps

episodes.name: 06 Christmas Episode
episodes.description: Recapping the football season and the start of the basketball season!
episodes.keywords: college,football,arkansas,wps,razorbacks,sec,basketball,bcs,school,hogcast,pig,sooie

episodes.name: 07 Auburn, Nicholls, Texas Tech Preview
episodes.description: Recap the Auburn and Nicholls game as well as preview Texas Tech.
episodes.keywords: arkansas,sports,sec,football,texas,tech,auburn,nicholls,state,woo,pig,sooie,wps,razorbacks,hogcast,bcs

episodes.name: 08 Hogs run over Texas Tech, NIU preview.
episodes.description: We recap the Hogs rout of Texas Tech and prepare for the NIU game at home next weekend.
episodes.keywords: arkansas razorbacks sports texas,tech,red,raiders,woo,pig,sooie,sec football bcs college,pig hogcast arkansas

episodes.name: 09 Club Bert Too Turnt
episodes.description: The hogs win big over one of the top teams in the MAC. We recap the win, look ahead to Texas A&M and take a look at how the rest of the conference looks thus far.
episodes.keywords: arkansas,razorbacks sec,sec,football,razorbacks,niu,bcs,mac,northern,illinois,university,woo,pig,sooie,wps,pig hogs go,hogs,hogcast,the,hog,cast

episodes.name: 10 Texas Meltdown
episodes.description: We suck it up and discuss the heart breaking loss to Texas A&M.
episodes.keywords: arkansas,sports,sec,football,texas,a&m,aggies,woo,pig,sooie,wps,razorbacks hogcast pig sooie bcs

episodes.name: 11   The Bye Week Blues
episodes.description: We discuss the wild and crazy games happening around the SEC west as well as preview the Alabama game.
episodes.keywords: Arkansas,SEC,WPS, Razorbacks, Woo Pig Sooie, Alabama, Crimson Tide, NCAA, Football, Sec West

episodes.name: 12   Arkansas - Bama Breakdown
episodes.description: Arkansas fails to capitalize on miscues by Alabama and sees another 4th quarter lead fall.
episodes.keywords: Arkansas, razorbacks, wps, Alabama, crimson tide, Georgia, Georgia bulldogs, UGA, UA, SEC, SEC WEST, NCAA, Football

episodes.name: 13   Bulldogged In The Rock
episodes.description: Arkansas sees a horrific second quarter ruin any hope of upsetting the top ten Georgia Bulldogs.
episodes.keywords: Arkansas, WPS, Woo Pig Sooie, Razorbacks,Football, SEC, SEC WEST, SEC EAST, Georgia, UGA, Bulldogs,hogs,hogcast

episodes.name: 14   UAB Review/ Miss St. Preview
episodes.description: Hogs win big over UAB and prepare for their shot at #1 Mississippi St.
episodes.keywords: Arkansas, SEC, Hogcast, Razorbacks, Hogs, Mississippi St, Bulldogs

episodes.name: 15   Hogs Let Game Slip Away in Starkville
episodes.description: Arkansas loses another heart breaker and lets #1 Mississippi State slip away.
episodes.keywords: Arkansas, SEC, WPS, Razorbacks, The Hog Cast, Hogs, Mississippi State, Bulldogs

episodes.name: 16  Bye Week, Basketball, and Scheduling
episodes.description: Chuck gives us an in depth look at Arkansas eastern conference foes over the years as well as discuss the upcoming Basketball season.
episodes.keywords: basketball, SEC, Arkansas, Razorbacks,WPS, Hogs, The Hog Cast, NCAA, NCAA tourney, Bud Walton, Mike Anderson

episodes.name: 17  Hog Basketball and LSU Preview
episodes.description: We give some basketball predictions and the talk the LSU game this weekend.
episodes.keywords: SEC, Arkansas, Razorbacks, LSU, Tigers, NCAA, Basketball,Football

episodes.name: 18   The Hogs Out-LSU LSU
episodes.description: The Razorbacks finally break their SEC losing streak and shut out LSU in Fayetteville.
episodes.keywords: Arkansas Razorbacks, LSU, SEC, WPS, The Hog Cast, Hog Cast, Tigers, SEC WEST, BCS, Football, Basketball, Mike Anderson, Bobby Portis

episodes.name: 19   Ole Miss Preview
episodes.description: We are joined by Ole Miss alum Alex McDaniel to break down the showdown with Ole Miss on Saturday."
episodes.keywords: Arkansas, Razorbacks, Ole Miss, Hotty Toddy, WPS, The Hog Cast, Football, Basketball, Mike Anderson, Alex McDaniel, Hogs, NCAA, SEC, SEC West

episodes.name: 20   Hogs Beatdown Ole Miss
episodes.description: Arkansas puts together their second straight SEC shutout with a huge win over Ole Miss. This makes Arkansas bowl eligible for the first time in two seasons.
episodes.summary: On this week's episode, the crew breaks down Arkansas' rousing win  over Ole Miss. Who caught the crew's eye? What does this mean for the  future of the Hogs? Why did this game remind Chuck of 1998? The crew  also looks ahead to the Missouri game and talk about why the Tigers  just keep finding ways to win. Colby fields some questions about  recruiting and the guys even discuss bowl possibilities. This was a  jam-packed episode of The Hogcast, and you won't want to miss any of  it. Go Hogs.
episodes.keywords: Arkansas, Hogs, The Hog Cast, SEC, SEC WEST , Ole Miss, Rebels, College Football, CFB, Razorbacks

episodes.name: 21   Missouri Game, Basketball, and Bowl Speculation.
episodes.description: Arkansas loses another 4th quarter lead to end regular season. We discuss Arkansas' bowl options as well as touch on Hog Basketball's 5-0 start.
episodes.summary: On this week's edition of The Hogcast, the gang breaks down the loss  to Missouri last Friday afternoon. What went wrong? Why was Brandon  Allen playing? Why did the Hogs abandon the run? What is the SEC so  intent on making this a rivalry? The guys try to answer all of those  questions in gritty, glorious detail. After the Mizzou breakdown,  it's time to talk about the streaking 6-0 Hog hoops team, fresh off  of a nice home win against Iona. The show wraps with bowl talk and  even bowl predictions.
episodes.keywords: Arkansas, WPS, The Hog Cast, Razorbacks, WPS, SEC , SEC WEST, MIZZOU, MIssouri, Tigers, Football, Basketball

episodes.name: 22   Basketball Blues, Hardwick, and The Texas Bowl
episodes.description: We discuss the Hog Basketball Woes of the week as well as talk about the hogs bowl selection in the Texas bowl. We also had the pleasure of interviewing Deontre Hardwick 4 Star Linebacker from Fort Smith Northside.
episodes.summary: In this week's episode, the crew talks about a disappointing week for hoops. What went so wrong on the road? The gang also touched on the juicy Arkansas-Texas matchup in the bowl game. Colby and Chuck also had 4-star linebacker, Deontre Hardwick, from Fort Smith Northside on for an interview.
episodes.keywords: Deontre Hardwick, Arkansas, Razorbacks, WPS, Hogs, The Hog Cast, SEC, SEC West,Basketball, Football.

episodes.name: 23   Dayton, More Texas Bowl, and Crockett Interview
episodes.description: We discuss the Razorbacks bounce back win at home against Dayton as well continue our coverage of the Texas bowl. We also had the privilege to interview another future hog Damarea Crockett
episodes.summary: On this week's episode, the crew dissects Arkansas' home win over an  underrated Dayton team. How did the Hogs fly past the Flyers? Then  the gang goes into great, painstaking detail on why each of them hate  the University of Texas. This segment could have went longer than it  did. After that, the guys react to the news that Will Muschamp will  be Auburn's defensive coordinator next fall. Recruiting capped things  off as Colby and Chuck interviewed Little Rock Christian's Demarea  Crockett and Logan gave his first-hand report of the Class 3A state  final game that featured a pair of University of Arkansas commits in  action for all the marbles.
episodes.keywords: Arkansas, Razorbacks, Dayton, SEC, SEC West, Texas, Crockett, Texas Longhorns, Texas Bowl, WPS, The Hog Cast

episodes.name: 24    Texas Bowl Preview/ Razorback Serial Parody
episodes.description: We touch on the basketball team's win in North Little Rock as well as their path to the tournament going forward. We spend the majority of the episode breaking down the Texas bowl and giving our keys to the game as well as predictions. We also take you on a journey for a  razorback parody of popular podcast Serial.
episodes.summary: Things got a little crazy this week. The gang recaps the Southeast  Missouri State game. What did the guys like about in a big win in  North Little Rock? Was there anything that they disliked? Then the  guys dig into the numbers for the Texas Bowl matchup against the  Longhorns of Texas. Where will the Hogs struggle and where will they  succeed? Then the guys break down the Autozone Liberty Bowl matchup  between Texas A&M and West Virginia. Then Colbs has a recruiting  update and a thrilling finish of randomness.
episodes.keywords: Texas Longhorns, Arkansas Razorbacks, Texas Bowl, WPS, The Hog Cast, Football, Basketball, Serial, Woo Pig Sooie

episodes.name: 25   Horns Down
episodes.description: The Hog Cast crew talks about Arkansas' dominating victory over Texas in  the Texas Bowl.
episodes.summary: On this very festive post-Texas Bowl Hogcast, the crew looks back on  the postseason contest against the hated Texas Longhorns. Why did the  win feel like more than a game for bragging rights? How can the win  help Arkansas moving into 2015? Why was everything Arkansas did so  right and Texas did so wrong? Colby, Chuck and Logan try to help you  with all of those questions and more.
episodes.keywords: Arkansas, Texas, Texas Bowl. Horns, Hogs, WPS, The Hog Cast, SEC, BIG 12

episodes.name: 26   Basketball Conference Opener and the Froholdt Brothers interview.
episodes.description: We recap Arkansas' comeback win at Georgia in the SEC conference opener. We also have a very special interview with Hjalte and Lars Froholdt.
episodes.summary: This week the gang breaks down a potentially-huge road win against  Georgia. Was this already one of Arkansas's biggest tests away from  home during the league schedule? How were the Hogs able to dig out of  a 13-point first-half deficit to win? Is it good to ride the hot hand  as much as the Hogs do? Then Logan and Colby interview the Froholdt  Brothers (Hjalte and Lars), who were gracious enough to  come onto the show. Then the guys talk about the SEC's bowl record  and the comings and goings with the football staff.
episodes.keywords: Arkansas, WPS, SEC, Razorbacks, Arkansas Razorbacks, Georgia Bulldogs,UGA, Georgia, The Hog Cast, Hogs, Froholdt, Hjalte Froholdt

episodes.name: 27   Basketball Woes and the Coaching Carousel
episodes.description: Arkansas' basketball had a terrible week on the court with two back breaking losses. We also talk about the coaching changes occurring for Bret Bielema and the football program.
episodes.summary: A lot has happened since the last time the crew was in the studio.  The wheels are wobbling on the Razorback basketball team's season.  How was Ole Miss able to invade Walton Arena and drill the Hogs? Is  the home court aura of invincibility gone?  Just because it's basketball season doesn't mean that there's no  football news, however. Hog Cast favorite Jim Chaney has left for the  greener pastures of Pittsburgh. What's the fallout of this decision  and how does it affect the status of K.J. Hill?
episodes.keywords: Arkansas,SEC,Football, SEC West, WPS, The Hog Cast, Basketball

episodes.name: 28  Alabama, Missouri, and Dan Enos
episodes.description: We talk about the hogs week bouncing back with 2 SEC wins. Also have some interesting discussions on the Club Bert blocking controversy and Alex McDaniel's recent Jurassic Park viewing.
episodes.summary: The Hogs hoop squad went 2-0 last week, but the crew is still kind of  shaky. What's on their mind? After that, the guys look at the new  football assistant coach hires, touch on recruiting and talk about  Jurassic Park. Yes, Jurassic Park, the movie. Not the Lost World. We  hope you enjoy the show.
episodes.keywords: SEC, Arkansas, WPS, Razorbacks, The Hog Cast, Football, Basketball, Alex Mcdaniel,

episodes.name: 29   Basketball Review, Murf Baldwin, and TJ Smith interview
episodes.description: We talk the week that was in Arkansas basketball, including the controversy in the swamp. We also have the pleasure of talking with Murf Baldwin from Saturday Down South about new OC Dan Enos and his philosophy. Then we have an exclusive recruiting interview from Colby with Arkansas recruit TJ Smith
episodes.summary: We talk the week that was in Arkansas basketball, including the controversy in the swamp. We also have the pleasure of talking with Murf Baldwin from Saturday Down South about new OC Dan Enos and his philosophy. Then we have an exclusive recruiting interview from Colby with Arkansas recruit TJ Smith
episodes.keywords: Arkansas, Razorbacks, The Hog cast, WPS , Murf Baldwin, Saturday Down South, TJ Smith, Basketball, Football, Florida, Tenneesee, Gators, Vols

episodes.name: 30   Hog Hoops, JJ Meadors, and Signing Day
episodes.description: We break down the week in hog hoops, interview hog legend JJ Meadors, and talk about the hogs 2015 recruiting class.
episodes.keywords: JJ Meadors, basketball, football, signing day, Meadors, The Hog Cast, Arkansas, Razorbacks, WPS, Miss State,

episodes.name: 31   Auburn, Ole Miss, and Alex McDaniel
episodes.description: We discuss the big week in Arkansas hoops with wins over Auburn and Ole Miss. We also have a lengthy discussion with Alex McDaniel about SEC Basketball... and Jurrasic Park
episodes.keywords: Arkansas,Basketball,SEC,Ole Miss, Auburn, The Hog Cast, Razorbacks, Rebels, Tigers

episodes.name: 32   Missouri, Miss State, and the Kentucky Preview
episodes.description: We talk about the sweep of the week for the hog hoops as well as preview the huge week against two tourney teams in Texas A&M and Kentucky.
episodes.keywords: Arkansas, Razorbacks, Basketball, SEC, Kentucky, Missouri, Mississippi State, Bulldogs, Methzou, Wildcats, football, beanum

episodes.name: 33   Texas A&M, Kentucky, and Martrell Spaight
episodes.description: We talk about the hogs hot start and slow finish against Texas A&M as well as the lopsided loss in Lexington. We also talk some bracketology and look at the final 2 regular season games. We were honored to have Martrell Spaight join us for a segment on the show. We talked about the hogs transition with Robb Smith, his time at the combine, the draft, and even look forward to the hogs 2015 season.
episodes.summary: We talk about the hogs hot start and slow finish against Texas A&M as well as the lopsided loss in Lexington. We also talk some bracketology and look at the final 2 regular season games. We were honored to have Martrell Spaight join us for a segment on the show. We talked about the hogs transition with Robb Smith, his time at the combine, the draft, and even look forward to the hogs 2015 season.
episodes.keywords: Arkansas, The Hog Cast, Kentucky, Wildcats, Texas A&M, Aggies, Martrell Spaight, Spaight, NCAA , College Football, Football, Baseball, Basketball, WPS

episodes.name: 34  South Carolina, LSU, and SEC Tourney Preview
episodes.description: We talk about the roller coaster game at South Carolina and the gut wrenching loss to LSU. We also talk about the upcoming SEC tourney and potential bracketology.
episodes.keywords: SEC, Kentucky, LSU, SEC Tourney, Hogs, The Hog Cast, Arkansas, Razorbacks

episodes.name: 35  SEC Tournament Review, Big Dance Preview, Arkansas Rivalry Talk
episodes.description: This week's episode may as well be called Hoop City. The crew touches  on Arkansas' three games at the SEC Tournament, as well as previewing  the Hogs' first NCAA Tournament game since 2008. In addition, they  want to know whether the Arkansas-LSU football rivalry is more  superior than the Arkansas-Kentucky hoops rivalry.
episodes.summary: This week's episode may as well be called Hoop City. The crew touches  on Arkansas' three games at the SEC Tournament, as well as previewing  the Hogs' first NCAA Tournament game since 2008. In addition, they  want to know whether the Arkansas-LSU football rivalry is more  superior than the Arkansas-Kentucky hoops rivalry.
episodes.keywords: Arkansas, Kentucky, SEC, Basketball, WIldcats, Mildcats, WPS, The Hog Cast, Razorbacks, Woo Pig Sooie,

episodes.name: 36   Wofford, Sleepy Hollow University , and season recap
episodes.description: We talk Arkansas' victory over Wofford, their defeat in a high pace exciting matchup with North Carolina, and give a season recap.
episodes.keywords: Arkansas Razorbacks, The Hog Cast, WPS,  Wofford, North Carolina, Tar Heels, Basketball, UNC, Sleepy Hollow

episodes.name: 37   Tourney Discussion, Qualls/Portis talk, and Diamond Hogs
episodes.description: We touch on the 2015 NCAA tourney, the Qualls/Portis decision and make predictions there. We also touch on the diamond hogs for very briefly for the first time this season and all while saving some time for throwing shade at Calipari.
episodes.summary: In this episode, the crew breaks down a truly memorable NCAA  Tournament. Is it the greatest one ever? Let's just say that it was  definitely asked, and not sarcastically. Then the crew turns their  focus back to Fayetteville and go on the record as to whether Bobby  Portis and Michael Qualls will return to school. Then the guys resort  to one of their favorite pastimes: Shading Kentucky head coach John  Calipari out. Arkansas baseball took a series from Ole Miss, is it a  turning point? Then Logan (of all people) breaks some recruiting news  at the end of the show. As always, thanks for listening.
episodes.keywords: Arkansas, SEC, Basketball, Bball, Razorbacks, The Hog Cast, Calipari, Kentucky, Baseball

episodes.name: 38   NCAA Tourney Wrap Up, Petrino Crash Anniversary, and Spring Football
episodes.description: We discuss the NCAA final four results and take one last shot at Kentucky's John Calipari for this season. We take a trip down memory lane and discuss the anniversary of Bobby Petrino's eventful motorcycle crash and the events that followed. Then we take a brief look at the diamond hogs and spring football.
episodes.keywords: Basketball, Baseball, Football, Petrino, Cal, Kentucky, Wisconsin, Spring Football, The Hog Cast

episodes.name: 39   Portis and Qualls Depature, and TJ Hammonds Interview
episodes.description: We discuss the recent announcement of Arkansas' biggest stars declaring for the NBA draft. What the lineup and expectations might be for next season. We also have an interview with Arkansas commit TJ Hammonds.
episodes.keywords: football, basketball, Hammonds, Razorbacks, the hog cast, NBA Draft, Portis, Qualls

episodes.name: 40   Hog Baseball Update, Spring Game, Cole Kelly Interview
episodes.description: We talk about the hogs baseball late season surge. We talk about the spring game and what we liked and didn't like. We even got Chuck to give Brandon Allen some praise which is definitely a sign of the apocalypse. Lastly, we have the most recent Arkansas commit quarterback Cole Kelly out of Louisiana for a talk.
episodes.keywords: Cole Kelly, Hog Cast, The Hog Cast, Baseball, Football, Miss State, Arkansas, Razorbacks

episodes.name: 42   SEC Baseball Tourney and Regional Preview
episodes.description: Arkansas went 2-2 in the SEC tournament and earned a #2 seed in the Stillwater, Oklahoma regional. We talk about what happened at the SEC tourney as well as breakdown the teams in the regional.
episodes.keywords: Arkansas, Baseball, Razorbacks, The Hog Cast, Hogcast, WPS, Woo Pig Sooie, Basketball, football,

episodes.name: 43   Arkansas Super Regional Breakdown
episodes.description: We discuss the upcoming matchup against Missouri State in the Fayetteville Super Regional.
episodes.keywords: Omaha, Baseball, Super Regional, Arkansas, Missouri State, Woo Pig, The Hog Cast

episodes.name: 44   College World Series and Season Review
episodes.description: We talk about the Razorbacks trip to Omaha and the College World Series as well as break down the amazing coaching job and turn around this season for Dave Van Horn and the Diamond Hogs.
episodes.keywords: Baseball, Omaha, WPS, The Hog Cast, Van Horn, Dave Van Horn, DVH

episodes.name: 45   Alabama Preview
episodes.description: Chuck and Colby visit with Alabama superfan Hayden George. How will the Crimson Tide react to a semifinal loss? Do people still fear the Alabama defense? What is the team's best and worst case scenario?
episodes.keywords: Alabama, WPS, Roll Tide, Arkansas, Razorbacks, Woo Pig, Woo Pig Sooie, Football

episodes.name: 46   Alex McDaniel and Ole Miss Preview
episodes.description: Alex McDaniel joins the hogcast to discuss and preview Ole Miss' upcoming season.
episodes.keywords: Arkansas, Ole Miss, Alex McDaniel, Football, Rebels, Hogs, The Hog Cast

episodes.name: 47   Rocketed in the Rock
episodes.description: Arkansas is upset in a devastating loss to the Toledo Rockets in Little Rock. The crew breaks down what happened and where we go from here.
episodes.keywords: Toledo, Arkansas Razorbacks, Arkansas, WPS, Hogcast, Football, Little Rock

episodes.name: 48   Hogs fall to Texas Tech
episodes.description: The razorback woes continue as the razorbacks drop their second straight game against old SWC foe Texas Tech. Chuck and Logan try to cope with the loss and talk through the state of the program and what has to happen next.
episodes.keywords: Bert, Bret Bielema, WPS, Hogs, Razorbacks, Texas Tech, Red Raiders,TTU,UA

episodes.name: 49   Hogs lose a heartbreaker against A&M
episodes.description: The crew discusses the heartbreaker and talks about the eerie similarities to the A&M game last season. We also preview the upcoming BERT off in Knoxville with Tennessee.
episodes.keywords: Tenneesee, Arkansas, Football, BERT, Bielema, Hogs, WPS, The Hog Cast

episodes.name: 50   Hogs big win at Rocky Top
episodes.description: The Razorbacks go into Rocky Top and win the biggest BERT of all time.
episodes.keywords: Razorbacks, WPS, Tenner, Tennessee, Arkansas, The Hog Cast, Woo Pig, Vols

episodes.name: 51  Auburn, Ole Miss, and LSU Huge Streak for the Hogs
episodes.description: The Hog Cast crew has been on hiatus but we are back to recap the triumphant return of Club Bert and his trusty barrel of fireball sidekick.
episodes.keywords: fireball, BERT, Bret Bielema, Arkansas, WPS, Hogs, The Hog Cast, Rebels, Ole Miss, LSU, Tigers, Auburn, Tigers, UA, UM,

episodes.name: 52 The Return
episodes.description: On this week's episode, the crew returns in a blaze of glory to look back at the 2016 football season, and what they've learned from spring and fall camp prior to the 2017 campaign. Logan, Colby and Chuck also fill you in on their lives since their last episode on November 2015 (the week after the Hunter Heave in Oxford against Ole Miss. People forget that).
episodes.keywords: Football, Hogcast, Woo Pig, Return, SEC, Hogs, WPS

episodes.name: 53  Frank Broyles, Offense, Defense Preview
episodes.description: This week, the guys from The HogCast reflect on the life of Frank Broyles, former Arkansas head football coach and athletic director. What was his lasting impact on Arkansas and college football? Then, the crew tells you which players on each side of the ball will need to produce in a big way for the Hogs to have success. ​
episodes.keywords: Frank Broyles, Bielema, WPS, Woo Pig Sooie, Arkansas, Arkansas Razorbacks

episodes.name: 54  2017 Season Preview
episodes.description: It is officially game week! The gang previews the Florida A&M game at War Memorial Stadium before going game-by-game and picking the Hogs' wins and losses in 2017. What's the final record? What type of bowl should you expect? They touch every base on this week's episode. ​
episodes.keywords: Hogs, WPS, Bert, Bielema, Razorbacks, Arkansas, SEC

episodes.name: 55 TCU Preview
episodes.description: The guys gather to recap the Florida A&M game, and add one more chapter to the Great Stadium Debate. Next up is TCU in what has become the Daniel Plainview Bowl (Milkshake Bet III). Can the Hogs compete with the Horned Frogs? Listen here and find out.
episodes.keywords: Bert, Arkansas, WPS, Woo Pig, TCU, SEC, Football
